model

Class ChanceCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ChanceCard

  • public class ChanceCard
extends java.lang.Object
    The Chance class contains the unique chance cards, generates the chance card deck, and distributes the chance card deck to players. The class also contains the different functions of the cards through methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChanceCard

        public ChanceCard(java.lang.String description,
                  int categoryIndex,
                  int localCategoryIndex,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Space> board,
                  Bank bank)
        Initializes a ChanceCard object.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of how the card is used.
        categoryIndex - The index of what category the object belongs to
        localCategoryIndex - The index of the object within the category
        board - The ArrayList of Space used in the game
        bank - The Bank used in the game

    • Method Detail

      • activateChance

        public void activateChance()
        Method called every time a ChanceCard object is activated. This method identifies what function the ChanceCard does based on it's two indices.
